name: Indriya
tagline: An experimental platform for human robot interaction based on human behaviors
body:

* [Simple gesture](https://www.youtube.com/embed/1QZ7ukK2hnE?list=PLm80h3-7SEzsLMZKHTOAxGW7hvnO1cKQx)

### Technologies/Tools/Libraries used
* [Kinect for windows V2](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/kinectforwindows/)
* [Visual studio](https://www.visualstudio.com)
* [ZeroMQ](http://zeromq.org)
* [Protocol buffers](https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/)
* [OpenCV](http://opencv.org)
* [Point Cloud Library](http://www.pointclouds.org)
* [OpenRAVE](http://openrave.org)
* [ALVAR Marker tracking](http://virtual.vtt.fi/virtual/proj2/multimedia/alvar/)
* [ScriptCS](http://scriptcs.net)
* [Boost](http://www.boost.org)
* [Quartz](http://www.quartz-scheduler.net)
* [Blockly](https://developers.google.com/blockly/)
* [jQuery](https://jquery.org)
* [Backbone](http://backbonejs.org)
* [Marionette](http://marionettejs.com)
* [Underscore](http://underscorejs.org)
* [ThreeJS](http://threejs.org)

### Authors and Contributors
Indriya has been developed by @praveenv4k as part of Master Thesis project.

### Support or Contact
Please submit an issue [here](https://github.com/praveenv4k/indriya/issues) and I will try to fix it as soon as possible
